column3: It's a good thing that when God created the rainbow he didn't consult a decorator or he would still be picking colors.
For God so loved the World that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
I can make a lord, but only God can make a gentleman.
God sent me on earth. He send me to do something, and nobody can stop me. If God want to stop me, then I stop. Man never can.
God has always given me the strength to say what is right.
They went into my closets looking for skeletons, but thank God, all they found were shoes, beautiful shoes.
God has cared for these trees, saved them from drought, disease, avalanches, and a thousand tempests and floods. But he cannot save them from fools.
It's my firm conviction that when Uncle Sam calls, by God we go, and we do the best that we can.

It is possible to become discouraged about the injustice we see everywhere. But God did not promise us that the world would be humane and just. He gives us the gift of life and allows us to choose the way we will use our limited time on earth. It is an awesome opportunity.
God gives every bird its food, but He does not throw it into its nest.
My religion is based on truth and non-violence. Truth is my God. Non-violence is the means of realising Him.
I don't pray because I don't want to bore God.

But however long you may have continued in rebellion, and how ever black and long the catalog of your sins, yet if you will now turn to God by a sincere repentance, and believe in the Lord Jesus Christ, you shall not be cast out.
To God be humble, to thy friend be kind, and with thy neighbors gladly lend and borrow; His chance tonight, it maybe thine tomorrow.
Put your faith in God and confidence in yourself.

Though everything else may appear shallow and repulsive, even the smallest task in music is so absorbing, and carries us so far away from town, country, earth, and all worldly things, that it is truly a blessed gift of God.
Jehovah God is truly rich far beyond the imagination of humankind.
Young man, the secret of my success is that at early age I discovered that I was not God.
Art, as far as it is able, follows nature, as a pupil imitates his master; thus your art must be, as it were, God's grandchild.
I have long known that it is part of God's plan for me to spend a little time with each of the most stupid people on earth.
The only two things that scare me are God and the IRS.

God's plan for enlarging His kingdom is so simple - one person telling another about the Savior. Yet we're busy and full of excuses. Just remember, someone's eternal destiny is at stake. The joy you'll have when you meet that person in heaven will far exceed any discomfort you felt in sharing the gospel.

We have domesticated God's transcendence. We often learn about God at about the same time as we are learning about Santa Claus; but our ideas about Santa Claus change, mature and become more nuanced, whereas our ideas of God can remain at a rather infantile level.

When love is pure, it has the power to conquer. Lover and beloved conquer each other by their affection. The source, the essence, the fullest manifestation of love's conquering power is the love of the soul for the supreme soul, or God.
Falling in love with God is the most important thing a person can do.

I was not popular in school, and I was definitely not a ladies' man. And I had a very painful adolescence, because it was all very strange to me. It wasn't like I got beat up, but the humiliation and isolation, and the existential 'God, I exist, and nobody cares' of being a teenager were extremely pronounced for me.
